basic.description: This course covers basic concepts of finite element analysis. Topics include boundary conditions; computer techniques used in structural analysis; structural finite elements for trusses, beams, beams on an elastic foundation, and frames; plane stress and plane strains in triangular elements; and engineering modeling.
basic.subject: CES
basic.title: Finite Elements in Structures

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: CES 4101 and MAP 3305 or MAP 2302.
